column7: If the rules were changed to allow most elements of Junko's look unspoiled, I feel like it would be fair to basically allow showing her, but always keeping the fact she's connected to the despair or being the mastermind hidden. Like, she can be showed on fan art without the spoiler tag, but if the title mentions despair, or the mastermind, or if the fanart itself suggests her final role, it should be spoiler tagged. Same with just her mastermind sprites, edits of them, etc. And I guess this should apply to memes and tier lists as well.

column7: This is the equivalent of trying to hide that Darth Vader is Anakin Skywalker - you can't really prevent people from knowing that Junko is the mastermind of DR1 given how substantially popular her character is. She's a significantly popular character to the point where only those who absolutely have never heard of the series before will be prevented from being spoiled on her hairpins form at the very least.
